name: Fighter Z
description:
The game is based on the collection and cultivation of classic Dragon Ball fighters as the core gameplay. As many as dozens of classic Dragon Ball fighters with distinctive personalities are in the palm of your hand. Fighting in the air, launching different nirvana skills, and performing exclusive tricks, giving players a shocking combat experience.
There are also classic gameplay systems that restore the dragon ball plot, such as the world's number one martial arts club, Dragon Ball Adventure, Shenlong Wish, Snake Dao, Masruta, etc. to meet the various PVP and PVE needs of players after they become fighters.
Son Goku, Vegeta, Bulma, Trunks... each and every familiar name, scene after scene of the classic plot, let us gather in the palm-"Ka Me Ha Me Ha"
